item.title: Network Rate Limiting with OpenWRT and a Single Board Computer
item.description: Notes eth1 should be used for SQM. Using eth0 for SQM will lock up the interface when it applies the settings. Add: /usr/lib/sqm/run.sh start to /etc/init.d/sqm so that sqm is started at boot. Bridge detection doesn’t work with SQM. Overview This provides a walk-through of how to install OpenWRT on a Raspberry Pi, and how to configure it to rate limit traffic going through it. On my own home network, I have a pretty performant network, however
